author: Toni Cuquerella
title: Sagunt dona llum verda a les obres de la Casa Romeu, palau del segle XVIII on va n√†ixer la figura local de la Guerra de la Independ√®ncia
text: Aquest dilluns s'ha signat l'acta per a l'inici de les obres de la Casa Romeu de Sagunt, edifici emblem√†tic del patrimoni de la ciutat. A m√©s, la regidora de Patrimoni Cultural i Industrial, Patricia S√°nchez, i el regidor de Contractaci√≥, Javier Raro, junt amb t√®cnics i arquitectes, han visitat l'edifici per a veure les condicions en les quals es troba la Casa Romeu. L'alcalde de Sagunt, Dar√≠o Moreno, ha ressaltat: ‚ÄúEn la legislatura passada vam complir amb una reivindicaci√≥ ciutadana que es mantenia des de feia molts anys, l'adquisici√≥ de la Casa Romeu‚Äù. D'altra banda, respecte a la signatura de l'acta, ha assenyalat: ‚ÄúHui comencem a fer els passos necessaris perqu√® este edifici hist√≤ric, que forma part del nostre patrimoni, siga tamb√© un edifici a l'abast de la ciutadania‚Äù. Esta primera fase de les obres √©s ‚Äúde consolidaci√≥, d'an√†lisi de tot l'edifici i de veure les seues potencialitats‚Äù, ha indicat Dar√≠o Moreno. En la segona fase ser√† la ‚Äúrehabilitaci√≥ definitiva‚Äù. L'alcalde de Sagunt ha afirmat que √©s un dia ‚Äúfeli√ß‚Äù, ja que s'est√† recuperant el patrimoni amb l'objectiu que es convertisca ‚Äúen un espai p√∫blic que tamb√© reta homenatge a les nostres figures hist√≤riques‚Äù. Per la seua banda, Patricia S√°nchez ha expressat: ‚ÄúAmb esta obra el que es garantir√† ser√† la seguretat tant de l'entorn com de l'edifici. S'actuar√† sobretot en les cobertes i en els forjats per a aix√≠ evitar els despreniments que ha tingut durant estos anys l'edifici‚Äù. Antecedents L'edifici de la Casa Romeu va ser comprat pel Consistori en 2020 per un valor de 390.000 euros. Es tracta d'un immoble d'una superf√≠cie de 349 metres quadrats que compta amb tres plantes, situat darrere de l'auditori Joaqu√≠n Rodrigo. L'edifici correspon a un model constructiu caracter√≠stic d'un palau del segle XVIII. L'immoble va ser la casa on va n√†ixer, el 26 de gener de 1778, Jos√© Romeu Parres, comandant de les mil√≠cies de Morvedre durant la Guerra d'Independ√®ncia, considerat com a heroi i fill c√®lebre de la ciutat.

author: Boston Herald
title: Ground News - Popular smoothie blender recalled
text:
Summary by Boston Herald BlendJet is recalling about 4.8 million of its portable blenders over laceration and fire hazards after receiving dozens of reports of injuries, federal regulators said Thursday. BlendJet 2 Portable Blenders can overheat or catch fire, according to a notice from the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission, and their blender blades can break off during use. There have been 329 reports of blades breaking during use to date, the CPSC said, as well ‚Ä¶ Share menu More

author: TV
title: MAFS star Lauren Dunn blasts trolls over nude photo leak
text: Married at First Sight Australia star Lauren Dunn has blasted trolls after naked photos of her were leaked online. The star appeared in the 11th season of the reality show, coupling up with Jonathan McCullough during the experiment before separating ahead of the final commitment ceremony. Despite not finding love on the show, Lauren has remained popular with fans ever since, and shared a video on her Instagram Stories in which she recalled a situation from her past which she is now being trolled over. Related: MAFS star JJ Slater shares loved-up photo with Katie Price‚ÄúI‚Äôve got a little story for you guys,‚Äù she began. ‚ÄúAbout 10 years ago, my ex at the time - I think, I don‚Äôt know if it was him, it could‚Äôve been someone else - leaked a topless photo that I had sent. And everyone ended up getting it, it was everywhere. ‚ÄúIt wasn‚Äôt a big deal - I mean, we‚Äôve all got tits and nipples so whatever - but lately I‚Äôve been getting a lot of messages saying that they‚Äôve got the photo. I‚Äôve even had random troll accounts trying to blackmail me with it. I‚Äôll post the photo - I look good. So swipe to the next slide for said nude.‚Äù‚ÄúHere she is in all her glory,‚Äù she quipped as she posted a censored version of the image. ‚ÄúSo if you didn‚Äôt have the photo like everyone else did, here it is. Obviously I can‚Äôt post nipples on here but you know, use your imagination.‚Äù Related: MAFS star Lucinda Light praised by co-star for 'following her heart'Turning on a more serious note, she then urged people to not share other people's photos: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt leak each other‚Äôs nudes - it‚Äôs actually illegal. \"This dude is lucky that I don‚Äôt care. I wouldn‚Äôt have sent it if I didn‚Äôt think someone was going to see it. However, that‚Äôs not usually the case. There‚Äôs laws against this for a reason so don‚Äôt do it.‚Äù Married at First Sight UK airs on E4 in the UK. Married at First Sight Australia airs on Nine Network in Australia and E4 in the UK.Interested in talking about Married at First Sight? author: @zazoomblog
title: Usb e pochi organici | La lotta continua
text:
Usb e pochi organici | La lotta continua
"Assunzioni insufficienti, la lotta continua". Non abbassa la guardia l‚ÄôUsb sanit√† di Ascoli nel dare notizia che "grazie alla nostra mobilitazione, il 21 marzo sono state pubblicate le Determine n. 82 e 85 relative alle assunzioni di OSS tramite concorso e mobilit√† in entrata". Il sindacato lamenta infatti che le notizie non sono del tutto positive: "rispetto alle 12 unit√† necessarie per colmare le perdite del solo 2024, verranno assunti appena 7 operatori. Di queste assunzioni, solo 3 arriveranno dai vincitori del concorso (su 6 previste), mentre 4 saranno da mobilit√† in entrata (su 6 previste). In pratica, non solo il numero di assunzioni √® inferiore a quanto garantito, ma addirittura pi√π posti vengono coperti tramite mobilit√† anzich√© con i vincitori del concorso". Per chi ha ottenuto il trasferimento tramite mobilit√†, ci sono gi√† delle date certe per l‚Äôingresso in servizio: 1 aprile e 1 maggio (1 unit√†), 1 giugno (2 unit√†).Leggi su Ilrestodelcarlino.it

author: Syndication Cloud
title: New Leaf Family Welcomes Attorney Katie Wilmoth to Their Team | dailytimesleader.com | Serving West Point & Clay County Since 1867
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
GOLDEN, Colorado, December 28, 2023‚Äî New Leaf Family is thrilled to announce the addition of attorney Katie Wilmoth to their growing team. As a skilled and compassionate family law attorney, Wilmoth brings a wealth of experience and dedication to the firm‚Äôs mission of providing exceptional legal representation in family law matters.
Christopher Anderson , CEO and founder of New Leaf Family, expressed his enthusiasm for the newest member of their team stating, ‚ÄúWe are honored and excited to have Katie Wilmoth join the firm. She is an attorney of extraordinary talent, and caring for her clients. She will be an excellent addition to New Leaf‚Äôs team of attorneys seeking to empower our clients to make the best decisions for themselves and their families.‚Äù
With a focus on custody, child support, divorce, spousal support, property division, and modification of existing court orders, Katie has established herself as a strong advocate for her clients. She understands the unique challenges involved in cases involving children and recognizes the importance of helping parents work together for the benefit of their children even after legal proceedings have concluded. Katie firmly believes in leading by example, prioritizing professionalism, and encouraging her clients to consider the needs of their children above personal animosity towards the other parent.
Katie brings a valuable skill set to her family law practice, boasting an impressive background in business and a Bachelor of Science degree majoring in Economics from New York University ‚Äì Leonard N. Stern School of Business. This background allows her to approach cases with a strategic mindset, evaluating not only the legal aspects but also the financial implications for her clients.
Rob Leitner, Chief Strategy Officer for New Leaf Family, noted that ‚ÄúKatie brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to the team. She is an outstanding advocate for her clients, and she continually demonstrates compassion and empathy.‚Äù Leitner added that ‚ÄúKatie has already made a significant impact on our legal team, and we are very excited about her future at the firm.‚Äù
Katie‚Äôs experience extends to handling high conflict cases, including those involving parental alienation, domestic violence, and alcohol and substance abuse. Her expertise in navigating complex and emotionally charged situations consistently guides her clients towards favorable outcomes, ensuring their rights and interests are protected throughout the legal process.
At New Leaf Family , the focus has always been on providing comprehensive and personalized legal services to individuals and families in need. Attorney Katie Wilmoth‚Äôs addition to the team further fortifies the firm‚Äôs commitment to excellence and strengthens their ability to serve clients facing challenging family law issues.
For more information about the legal services offered by New Leaf Family or to schedule a consultation with attorney Katie Wilmoth, please visit their website at www.newleaf.family or contact their office at (720) 712 ‚Äì 3253.
New Leaf Family is a reputable law firm dedicated to providing compassionate and effective legal representation to individuals and families in and around Golden, CO. In addition to their client-centered approach, which empowers people to make decisions in their family‚Äôs best interest, New Leaf Family provides a variety of coaching and counseling services to assist clients at every stage of the process. They are committed to providing excellent legal services at fair costs as a dependable resource for local families.
The founders, Christopher T. Anderson and Penn Dodson, have been awarded Avvo 10.0 (Superb), and Martindale.com has rated the firm AV ‚Äì Preeminent. Most important, however, are the clients who have experienced being a part of the New Leaf Family. See www.newleaf.family for more.
Media Contact:
